Text: Hey, could you make one where you can open it on Mac OS X? Would be greatly appreciated, but it's still a great torrent nonetheless. :)

If you want just the books without all the exe nasties, you can unpack this executable using a utility called "Universal Extractor."

You will find the books in a folder named "Docs." They only take up 2.6 MB, while an MP3 in that folder takes up 9.3 MB. The rest of the application is a bunch of code that does god knows what to your computer.
